subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: After winning his first major in Melbourne in January, third-seeded Stan Wawrinka of Switzerland tumbled in the first round at Roland Garros to Guillermo García-López of Spain.
snippet: After winning his first major in Melbourne in January, third-seeded Stan Wawrinka of Switzerland tumbled in the first round at Roland Garros to Guillermo García-López of Spain.
